entry.question: Do I have to show my opponent which card I’m putting into my hand?
entry.answer: Yes. Your opponent is allowed to see the card and verify it has exactly 1 star.

entry.question: Say I upgrade a character that already has a Bounty ability with Valuable Contract. If it does enough attack damage to an enemy to KO it, what happens?
entry.answer: In that case, you’ll get to use both Bounty abilities in either order. You can’t use the character’s Bounty ability twice or Valuable Contract’s Bounty ability twice though.
